span.p:
Date : Thursday, September 19, 2013
Time : 13:30 - 16:30
Venue : Louis-Jolliet Boat
Price : $40.00

Discover Quebec city the way it’s very founders did it. The boat cruise on St-Lawrence river will show you to the most beautiful sites of the city, its very own Château Frontenac, our magnificent waterfall along with numerous others attractions. Louis Jolliet himself awaits you!

Date : Thursday, September 19, 2013
Time : 13:30 - 16:30
Venue : Place Laurier
Price : Free

You want to go shopping? Hop on a daily bus ride that will get you to the biggest shopping mall in Quebec city where tons of different boutiques and shops will surely satisfy your need of a nice souvenir.

Date : Thursday, September 19, 2013
Time : 13:30 - 16:30
Venue : Old Quebec City
Price : $20.00

Quebec has the perfect setting for history amateurs. Come and discover the magnificent city of Quebec on a walking guided tour that will take you inside the deepest secrets on this 400 years old town.

Date : Thursday, September 19, 2013
Time : 13:30 - 16:30
Venue : La Barberie Microbrewery
Price : $25.00
La Barberie, a Quebec microbrewery proposes to explain its unique way of making beer. Come and see how cheese and beer can marry their flavors together!

div.p:
Date : Thursday, September 19, 2013
Time : 17:00 - 18:00
Venue : National Assembly of Quebec
Room : Le Parlementaire Restaurant

Date : Thursday, September 19, 2013
Time : 18:00 - 23:00
Venue : National Assembly of Quebec
Room : Le Parlementaire Restaurant

Come enjoy with us a special evening for the JCI awards night on Thursday September 19, 2013 at Le Parlementaire. Located at National assembly, The parliament building is imposing with its four wings forming a square roughly 100m on each side. The eloquent architecture and interior decoration offer a veritable fresco of Québec history. Witness to parliamentary social life, host of numerous State Dinners and formal receptions and venue par excellence for Québec products, Le Parlementaire is unique among the region’s restaurants.
The JCI Quebec team is awaiting for this formal evening in a unique setting.
Le Parlementaire, the best kept secret of Quebec City!
From 23:00

Here’s the activity to compete with your fellow JCI members. Behind the wheel of your kart, try to beat records and friends. Be careful though, having the first line at the start, does not guarantee victory!

Date : Saturday, September 21, 2013
Time : 13:30 - 16:30
Venue : Arbraska Duchesnay
Price : $40.00

Want a real challenge? The Arbre en arbre activity has just the one for you! In the heart of the Jacques Cartier river’s park, you will stroll from one tree to another on courses ranging from easy to very hard. Register and test your limits. Do not register if you’ve experienced vertigo in the past.

Date : Saturday, September 21, 2013
Time : 13:30 - 16:30
Venue : Circuit ICAR
Price : $250.00
B dream come true ! Come live that unforgettable experience behind the wheel of a legendary car and show what you’re worth on aclosed circuit!
